summary: 该接口用于查看DBS运行节点网段列表。

schema.description: DBS地域，可通过调用[DescribeRegions](~~437238~~)接口查看DBS支持地域。
用于保证请求的幂等性，防止重复提交请求。

ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "HttpStatusCode": 200,
  "RequestId": "5B352E69-E7B1-4EA7-BB8E-29FFE969C791",
  "ErrCode": "Param.NotFound",
  "Success": true,
  "ErrMessage": "The specified parameter %s value is not valid.     ",
  "IntranetIPs": {
    "IntranetIP": [
      "\"10.X.X.0/24\""
    ]
  },
  "InternetIPs": {
    "InternetIP": [
      "\"10.X.X.0/24\""
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<RequestId>5B352E69-E7B1-4EA7-BB8E-29FFE969C791</RequestId>
<InternetIPs>
    <InternetIP>118.X.X.0/24</InternetIP>
    <InternetIP>47.X.X.0/24</InternetIP>
</InternetIPs>
<HttpStatusCode>200</HttpStatusCode>
<IntranetIPs>
    <IntranetIP>10.X.X.0/24</IntranetIP>
    <IntranetIP>10.X.X.0/24</IntranetIP>
    <IntranetIP>10.X.X.0/24</IntranetIP>
</IntranetIPs>
<Success>true</Success>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查看DBS运行节点网段
